transcription.text: Apo, for account security lamang po yung last formal number para may note ito po. 7937, confirm po ba? Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam? Ang sabi niyo po.

transcription.text: Yes po. Yung... yung Juko tapos yung Astadine Balance po.

transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: So, nag-zero na po sa inyong Maya.

transcription.text: Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam?

transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Gina Jane Quinta Negra Francis, tama po.
translation.english: Gina Jane Quinta Negra Francis, correct?

translation.tagalog: Apo, mamagandang umaga. Ito po si Christine from AMC Collections on behalf of Maya. Right?
translation.english: Yes, good morning. This is Christine from AMC Collections on behalf of Maya. Right?

translation.tagalog: Apo, for account security lamang po yung last formal number para may note ito po. 7937, confirm po ba? Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam? Ang sabi niyo po.
translation.english: Yes, for account security only, the last four digits of your mobile number are 7937. Is that correct? Yes. How much was the payment you settled last night, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Yes po. Yung... yung Juko tapos yung Astadine Balance po.
translation.english: Yes. The... the Juko and then the remaining balance.

translation.tagalog: Apo, magkano po yung total lahat niyo na para may document ko on your account?
translation.english: Yes, how much was the total so I can document it in your account?

translation.tagalog: So, nag-zero na po sa inyong Maya.
translation.english: So it’s already zeroed out in your Maya.
Where is my Maya? Uh, yes.

translation.tagalog: Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam?
translation.english: Yes, how much was the payment you settled last night, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Ano po? Apo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment kagabi, mam?
translation.english: What? Yes, how much was the payment you settled last night, ma'am?

translation.tagalog: Apo, pero kung naalala mo, magkano po yung sinettle yung payment para may document natin on your account?
translation.english: Okay, but if you remember, how much did you pay so we can document it in your account?

translation.tagalog: At the same time, nag-sit sa apps niyo, no? Tama po?
translation.english: And it was reflected in your app, right?

translation.tagalog: seven... Hindi ko matanan. Ano po yan?
translation.english: Seven... I can't recall. What is it?

translation.tagalog: Nag-sit na po sa apps, kumaga wala na po kayong unsettled payment.
translation.english: It was already reflected in the app, meaning you don’t have any unsettled payment.

translation.tagalog: Nab. Wala na po. Ah... yes.
Nakapag-reload na po ba kayo, ma?
Kumbaga, nahiram niyo po ba or hindi pa po?
translation.english: So, did you borrow again or not?

translation.tagalog: Hiniram ko uli yung pera po?
Okay po. Sige, ma'am. In-annotate ko po at the same time. Salamat po sa pagtanggap sa tawag at sa pagbabayad po.
translation.english: Okay, ma'am. I will annotate that as well. Thank you for answering the call and for making your payment.
